snippet: Raytheon is buying the cybersecurity company Websense from the private equity firm Vista Equity Partners in a deal valued at $1.9 billion, a move aimed at making defense-grade cyberprotection available to businesses.
lead_paragraph: Raytheon is buying the cybersecurity company Websense from the private equity firm Vista Equity Partners in a deal valued at $1.9 billion, a move aimed at making defense-grade cyberprotection available to businesses.

headline.main: In Purchase, Raytheon Gets Defense-Grade Cybersecurity
headline.print_headline: In Purchase, Raytheon Gets Defense-Grade Cybersecurity
